tape.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: narrow plastic material covered with a special magnetic substance, on which you can record sounds, pictures, or computer information
tape.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: We’ve got the film on tape.
I hate hearing my voice on tape.
tape.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a special plastic box containing a length of tape that you can record sound on
tape.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: I’ll listen to the tape tomorrow.
William lent me some of his Beatles tapes.
Bring me a blank tape and I’ll record it for you.
We played a tape of African music and began dancing.
tape.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a special plastic box containing a length of tape that you can record sound and pictures on
tape.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a narrow length of plastic that is sticky on one side and is used to stick things together
tape.translation[0].definitions[3].examp: a photo stuck to the wall with tape
tape.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: a long thin piece of plastic or cloth used for purposes such as marking out an area of ground or tying things together
tape.translation[0].definitions[4].examp: Crime-scene tape marked out the position of the murdered man.
tape.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to record sound or pictures onto a tape
tape.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Would you mind if I taped this conversation?
tape.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to stick something onto something else using tape
tape.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: There were two pictures taped to the side of the fridge.
tape.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: to fasten a package, box etc with sticky tape
tape.translation[1].definitions[3].defin: to tie a bandage firmly around an injured part of someone’s body
tape.translation[1].definitions[3].note_: Tape is often passive in this meaning
tape.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: narrow plastic material, usually inside a plastic box, used for storing computer information, sounds, or pictures
tape.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: These tapes are held centrally and are accessible to many users.
Court proceedings are usually recorded on tape.
